sentences.en: He was sharply reprimanded for his negligence.
sentences.cn: 他因玩忽职责而受到严厉的申斥.

sentences.en: His negligence was nothing less than criminal.
sentences.cn: 他的粗心大意无异于犯罪.

sentences.en: Many a customer has been lost through negligence of service.
sentences.cn: 由于服务不周失去了许多老主顾.

sentences.en: negligence in carrying out safety procedures
sentences.cn: 执行安全程序时的疏忽
她的玩忽职守是无法掩饰的。
可能这不过是一种不修边幅而已.

sentences.en: The accident was caused by negligence on the part of the driver.
sentences.cn: 事故是由于司机的过失造成的。

sentences.en: The accident was caused by the negligence of the driver.
sentences.cn: 事故是由司机的疏忽造成的.

sentences.en: The accident was due to negligence.
sentences.cn: 事故是由于粗心大意引起的.

sentences.en: The accident was the result of negligence.
sentences.cn: 这次事故是由于疏忽所致.

sentences.en: The bridge’s architect was sued for criminal negligence.
sentences.cn: 那座桥梁的建筑师被控犯有玩忽职守罪。

sentences.en: The company were guilty of gross negligence.
The court made a finding of contributory negligence.
sentences.cn: 法庭作出判决认定受害方犯有共同过失.

sentences.en: The plaintiff was guilty of contributory negligence for failing to wear a crash helmet.
sentences.cn: 原告因未戴安全头盔而负有连带责任.

sentences.en: The soldiers were ordered to appear before a disciplinary council on charges of negligence.
sentences.cn: 士兵们被控玩忽职守，被勒令接受纪律委员会的审查。

sentences.en: They charged him with negligence of duty.

words.tran_cn: 被忽视的；未被好好照管的
疏忽的；忽略的；不小心的

phrases.tran_cn: 重大过失；严重过失；显著的疏忽

trans.tran_en: failure to take enough care over something that you are responsible for
